import { Callout } from "nextra/components";
import { FileTree } from "nextra/components";

# Themes

VitNode allows you to create your own theme which allows user to change the look of the page.

<Callout type="warning" emoji="⚠️">
  Make sure you have [developer mode](/dev) enabled.
</Callout>

## Plugin schema

When you're created a theme VitNode will clone files form the default theme.

<FileTree>
  <FileTree.Folder name="frontend" defaultOpen>
    <FileTree.Folder name="themes" defaultOpen>
      <FileTree.Folder name="{id_theme}" defaultOpen>
        <FileTree.Folder name="core" />
        <FileTree.Folder name="forums" />
        <FileTree.Folder name="...other plugins" />
        <FileTree.File name="theme.json" />
      </FileTree.Folder>
    </FileTree.Folder>
  </FileTree.Folder>
</FileTree>

## Exclude from update

VitNode has own update system for templates in themes. If you want to exclude from update just add to the top of the file `// ! no-replace`.

```tsx
// ! no-replace

import type { ReactNode } from "react";

interface Props {
  children: ReactNode;
}

export default function Layout({ children }: Props) {
  return <main className="flex-grow">{children}</main>;
}
```

<Callout type="error" emoji="❌">
  Do not use `// ! no-replace` in the root theme (ID: 1).
</Callout>
